net.sf.JRecord.Common

Interface IBasicFileSchema

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicFileSchema, LayoutDetail

    public interface IBasicFileSchema

    A minimal File Schema definition. It provides a minimal set of definitions (like RecordLength & character=set) for creating Readers / Writer.

    The schema's of JRecord / RecordEditor / ReCsvEditor / ProtoBufEditor extend / implement this interface.

    Author:
    Bruce Martin
